#summary Explanation of the Processing folder.

= Processing Folder =

This folder contains sketches for the [http://processing.org/ Processing] video synthesis programming environment.

At the moment you have:
  * Batteri
  * Cubes
  * MidiCircles
  * MidiFluo
  * MidiRectangles
  * MonsterClass
  * PerlinSurface
  * Pixeles
  * Vasarely1
  * Vasarely2
